1.Q: What is the IPv6 address used by OSPFv3 non-DR/BDR routers to send link-state updates and link-state acknowledgments?
1.Expl: Non-DR/BDR routers send an update or link-state acknowledgment message to the DR and BDR by using the AllDRouters address FF02::6.

2.Q: What are two reasons for creating an OSPE network with multiple areas? (Choose two.)

Choices.C1: to ensure that an area is used to connect the network to the Internet
Choices.C2: to provide areas in the network for routers that are not running OSPF
Choices.C3: to reduce use of memory and processor resources
